amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 1225 which authorizes the Secretary of Defense and the Secretary of State to develop and implement a strategy with foreign partners to counter the destabilizing activities of Iran.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 115-698 to strike section 1225, a required strategy to counter destabilizing activities of Iran.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gabbard amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 60 - 355 (Roll no. 220).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Gabbard.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gabbard amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 60 - 355 (Roll no. 220).
